title: please check pc display settings

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an issue with the resolution that the client is trying to launch the game in. Try hitting **ALT+ENTER** once you see the loading screen pop up. This should toggle you through different windowed modes and could bypass the issue. Make sure to test this in a custom match to avoid any Leaverbuster penalties.

Let me know if this helped.
